text: Ultamatix is a computer program to install other programs on Ubuntu and Debian-based distributions. == History == Since the development of Automatix has ended, Ultamatix was developed to provide user an easy way to install software on their Ubuntu systems. == Supported software == Many software/features can be installed with Ultamatix, including programs such as the Flash plugin, Adobe Reader, multimedia codecs (including MP3, Windows Media Audio and video-DVD support), fonts, programming software (compilers) and games. ==Related pages== *Getdeb ==Other websites== *Ubuntu extras remix , a version of Ubuntu that already includes ubuntu-restricted-extras Category:Linux software
title: Ultamatix
